text:
e="preserve">Council Julian Dunbar Jr. (August 4, 1922 – September 14, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was in the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1971 to 1972, representing Allendale County, South Carolina. He was an insurance agent. Dunbar Jr. was born in Martin, South Carolina.
Dunbar Jr. died on September 14, 2020 at the age of 98.
